entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
